Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam elected to bat after winning the toss in hot and sultry conditions in Chennai
South Africa's regular skipper Temba Bavuma returned to lead the side, and he confirmed that South Africa would've also preferred to bat first in the hot conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Digital Daily looks at South Africa's tense victory over Pakistan during the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023, with player of the match Tabraiz Shamsi
Player of the match highlights as Tabraiz Shamsi spun a web around Pakistan with a four-wicket haul on his return to the side at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
Miscellaneous Highlights: A seeming shift in mindset saw Pakistan maintain an attacking approach for much of their innings, but they struggled to get a South Africa attack away at times
The Proteas pacers showed early discipline and didn't bowl too many loose balls
Pakistan hit eight boundaries in the first Powerplay and looked to keep up the scoring rate against South Africa in Chennai
